title: Cross compiling from Linux to Windows
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `geth version`
ubunto
 
#### Expected behaviour


#### Actual behaviour
no build, i can't build geth 

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````

Geth has a few C snippets/libraries embedded. As such you need CGO enabled (`CGO_ENABLED=1`). Even after that though, you need a `gcc` toolkit available that can cross compile to Windows and need to manually set `CC` to it.

My suggestion would be to use the docker container based cross compilation already bundled with the repository in the Makefile `make geth-windows-amd64`. This does depend on a shopping 4GB docker image (which can cross build to basically everything). Perhaps try this approach and tell us how it goes?
